title: How to Tell If Your Instagram Message Was Read

steps.title: Open the Instagram app on your Android, iPhone, or iPad.
steps.content: Open the Instagram app on your Android, iPhone, or iPad.

steps.title: Tap the chat bubble on your feed.
steps.content: Tap the chat bubble on your feed. When you're viewing your Instagram feed, you'll see this icon at the top-right corner. If you don't see this icon, tap the Home tab first.

steps.title: Tap the direct message.
steps.content: Tap the direct message. This opens the DM .

steps.title: Look for "Seen" at the bottom of the message.
steps.content: Look for "Seen" at the bottom of the message. If the other person has read your message but hasn't sent a reply, the word "Seen" will be visible just above the typing area at the bottom-right corner. If the message is a group chat , you'll see the names of everyone who has read your message next to "Seen." "Seen" will disappear once the person replies to your message. While you can't turn off read receipts on Instagram, there are some workarounds that let people sneakily read DMs without being seen. The workarounds are pretty involved, so most people don't use them. Instagram is reportedly working on allowing users to turn off read receipts, but the feature hasn't rolled out yet.
